comment.author: 69755091@N07
comment._content:
Name: JORDAN 
Initials: Charles William 
Nationality: United Kingdom 
Rank: Private 
Regiment/Service: 13th Hussars 
Date of Death: 05/03/1917 
Age: 32
Service No: 3850 
Casualty Type: Commonwealth War Dead 
Grave/Memorial Reference: XI. F. 15. 
Cemetery: BAGHDAD (NORTH GATE) WAR CEMETERY
Born: Hoxton, London
Enlisted: Stratford, London
Resident: London
Source: CWGC and Soldiers Died CD-ROM

comment.author: 69755091@N07
comment._content:
Medal Index Card shows he arrived in France on the 15th December 1914.

He was a career soldier who is listed in the 1911 Census as serving with the 13th Hussars in Meerut, India aged 26.

comment.author: 38811045@N04
comment._content: His number indicates he joined the Corps of Hussars in the second half of January 1909. See my blog post on Queen's and King's Regulations regarding numbering in the British Army: armyservicenumbers.blogspot.com/2009/03/queens-kings-regu...

comment.author: 32300107@N06
comment._content: Thank you Paul and Scarletboyy44 for your contributions.
